name: Reference - Dagger: Modeling and visualization for mission impact situational awareness
x_kb_abstract: Dagger is a modeling and visualization framework that addresses the challenge of representing knowledge and information for decision-makers, enabling them to better comprehend the operational context of network security data. It allows users to answer critical questions such as “Given that I care about mission X, is there any reason I should be worried about what is going on in cyberspace?” or “If this system fails, will I still be able to accomplish my mission?”.
x_kb_reference_title: Dagger: Modeling and visualization for mission impact situational awareness
